name: Deathleaper
legend: The Deathleaper is an advancement of the Lictor strain intended to act as a terror weapon. Possessing an instinctive understanding of how to spread fear through prey populations, it uses its skills in stealth, infiltration and assassination to sow paranoia and dread before the hive fleet attacks en masse.
loadout: This model is equipped with: Lictor claws and talons.

abilities.name: Fights First
abilities.legend: Some warriors attack with blinding speed, landing their blows before their foes can react.
abilities.description:
Some warriors attack with blinding speed, landing their blows before their foes can react.

Units with this ability that are eligible to fight do so in the Fights First step, provided every model in the unit has this ability.

abilities.name: Infiltrators
abilities.legend: Many armies employ reconnaissance units who can sit concealed, waiting for the right moment to strike.
abilities.description:
Many armies employ reconnaissance units who can sit concealed, waiting for the right moment to strike.

During deployment, if every model in a unit has this ability, then when you set it up, it can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from the enemy deployment zone and all enemy models.

abilities.name: Lone Operative
abilities.legend: Assassins and other covert agents are difficult to track and pinpoint in the swirling maelstrom of battle.
abilities.description:
Assassins and other covert agents are difficult to track and pinpoint in the swirling maelstrom of battle.

Unless part of an Attached unit (see Leader), this unit can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 12".

abilities.name: Stealth
abilities.legend: Some warriors are masters of disguise and concealment.
abilities.description:
Some warriors are masters of disguise and concealment.

If every model in a unit has this ability, then each time a ranged attack is made against it, subtract 1 from that attack’s Hit roll.

abilities.name: Feeder Tendrils
abilities.description: Each time this model destroys an enemy CHARACTER model, you gain 1CP.

abilities.name: Fear of the Unseen (Aura)
abilities.description: While an enemy unit is within 6" of this model, worsen the Leadership characteristic of models in that unit by 1. In addition, in the Battle-shock step of your opponent’s Command phase, if such an enemy unit is below its Starting Strength, it must take a Battle-shock test.

abilities.name: HUNTER ORGANISM
abilities.description: This model cannot be your WARLORD.
